high_descs: Turn around and face the dresser on the right.
Pick up the clock from the back of the dresser.
Hold the clock, and move a step to the left.
Holding the clock, turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a clock and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: turn around, take a couple steps, turn right to face the dresser
pick up the alarm clock that is on the dresser
take a couple steps to the left to stand in front of lamp
anns.task_desc: examine the alarm clock with a lamp

high_descs: Turn left to face the dresser.
Pick up the alarm clock on the dresser.
Move a bit to the left to face the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at the alarm clock by lamp light.
